description: This file defines a ServiceProvisioningService class that provides methods to interact with a backend API for managing services, including CRUD operations, deployment, status checks, metrics, logs, validation, cloning, exporting, importing, and deployment previews.

classes.name: ServiceProvisioningService
classes.description: A class encapsulating methods to manage services via API calls, including deployment, status, logs, validation, and other service-related operations.

methods.name: getServices
methods.description: Fetches a paginated list of services with optional search.

methods.name: getService
methods.description: Retrieves details of a specific service by ID.

methods.name: createService
methods.description: Creates a new service with provided data.

methods.name: updateService
methods.description: Updates an existing service identified by ID.

methods.name: deployService
methods.description: Deploys a service to target devices.

methods.name: undeployService
methods.description: Undeploys a service from target devices.

methods.name: getServiceStatus
methods.description: Retrieves current deployment and health status of a service.

methods.name: getServiceMetrics
methods.description: Fetches metrics for a service, optionally within a specified time range.

methods.name: getServiceLogs
methods.description: Retrieves logs for a service with optional limit and level filters.

methods.name: validateServiceConfiguration
methods.description: Validates a service configuration before deployment.

methods.name: previewServiceDeployment
methods.description: Previews commands and estimated duration for deploying a service.

methods.name: getDeploymentHistory
methods.description: Retrieves deployment history for a service.

methods.name: rollbackService
methods.description: Rolls back a service to a previous deployment.

methods.name: cloneService
methods.description: Clones an existing service with a new name.

methods.name: exportService
methods.description: Exports the configuration of a service as a Blob.

methods.name: importService
methods.description: Imports a service configuration from a file.
